duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure proper care and maintenance of companion animals and aquatic life in the Pet Care Center.
Process register transactions and provide a positive guest experience.
Maintain stock, price, and display of merchandise for guest presentation.
Complete training programs and educate other Pet Care Center partners in animal care and maintenance.
Promote a positive culture of teamwork, inclusion, and collaboration.
Adhere to operational guidelines, policies, and procedures.
Evaluate guest inquiries and provide animal education and care information.
Order companion animals, aquatic life, supplies, and merchandise to maximize sales and inventory.
Analyze department inventory data and recommend improvements.
Perform routine housekeeping tasks and animal-related maintenance.
Handle and document relinquished and adoption animals.
Participate in animal and aquatic life physical inventory counts.
Adhere to safety and loss prevention procedures.
Contribute to creating a safe and collaborative culture for pet care.
Engage in career development and skills growth programs.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent (GED); proficiency in mathematics and basic accounting; exceptional communication skills.
